clients.title: Add & Answer FAQs on Your Google My Business Profile
description: Your Google My Business (GMB) profile is valuable for your SEO and for local search. We recommend taking advantage of the Q&A feature to engage with prospective clients and answer questions they might have. You donâ€™t even have to wait for someone to ask a question; you can write answers to frequently asked questions and pin them to your listing, along with the top answers.
